sentences.english: The following figure provides an architectural overview of the solution suggested in this article.
sentences.chinese: 下图提供了本文中所建议的解决方案的一个架构概览。

sentences.english: This dialog provides an overview of the created data types.
sentences.chinese: 这个对话框提供已创建数据类型的概览。

sentences.english: This document outlines different WAF functionality.
sentences.chinese: 该文档概览了不同的WAF功能。

sentences.english: If you're interested in the basic operations you can do on product configurations, head back to Overview.
sentences.chinese: 如果对产品配置的基本操作感兴趣，请参考概览。

sentences.english: The overview ruler can also indicate other points of interest in your editor.
sentences.chinese: 概览标尺还可以表示编辑器中其他需要注意的位置。

sentences.english: We will give a brief overview of each of these programming models in this article.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中，我们将对每个编程模型进行简单的概览。

sentences.english: A diagram can then help as a part of the description to give an instant overview.
sentences.chinese: 作为描述的一部分，图有助于给出一个快速的概览。

sentences.english: This shows you a basic overall representation of your stats.
sentences.chinese: 此页面给你提供一个你发的消息的基本的概览。

definition: to outline/to summarize/to sketch/summary/brief description/concise narrative/in a nutshell/briefly
to explain in detail/detailed answer/full solution (to a math problem)
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report
to sum up/a roundup/a general narrative
